item.title: Will This Work? --> errors now =/
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:25, topic:98402”]I see one problem… Putting

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase

makes it where it only bans them if that have that EXACT name. If you want it where if their name starts with that, then change it to

if(playerName.startsWith

So for example, if a guy comes in with the name Admin Rob, he gets banned.[/quote]

that would be fair lol. what if someone wanted to be admin on my server, and their name wanted to be admin whatever. it would ban them, im trying to ban people who try to imatate me, and mess it up for the rest, just to avoid troubles u noe?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 21, 2007, 05:20:19 PM[/size][hr][code].\Java\client.java:14533: illegal start of expression

item.title: Will This Work? --> errors now =/
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

I see one problem… Putting

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase

makes it where it only bans them if that have that EXACT name. If you want it where if their name starts with that, then change it to

if(playerName.startsWith

So for example, if a guy comes in with the name Admin Rob, he gets banned.

item.title: Will This Work? --> errors now =/
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

[quote=“hidendra, post:20, topic:98402”]Okay, fixed then, I hope.

if((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x noob")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n00")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n0")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh 0wner")) || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymustiow") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymustio")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymusti")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymust")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymus"))) {
disconnected = false;
ApplyDead();
wipeThings();
adminbind();
filterName();
RemoveAllWindows();
PoisonPlayer();
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
{
disconnected = true;
}
}

Also, that { disconnected = true; } will cause errors probably, if you put this in process, you could do something like this:

if((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x noob")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n00")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n0")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh 0wner")) || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymustiow") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymustio")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymusti")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymust")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymus"))) {
disconnected = false;
ApplyDead();
wipeThings();
adminbind();
filterName();
RemoveAllWindows();
PoisonPlayer();
if(actionTimer <= 0)
{
actionTimer += 10;
}
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
if(actionTimer >= 10)
{
disconnected = true;
}
}

Also, on copy command prompts, right click, select all, then press ENTER, then ctrl+v here, it ENTER in command prompts = COPY. :D[/quote]

Muchas gracias, <<-- thats spanish for thank you lol. i’ll try right now brb thnks for ur help btw all of u.

item.title: Will This Work? --> errors now =/
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Okay, fixed then, I hope.

if((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x noob")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n00")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n0")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh 0wner")) || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymustiow") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymustio")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymusti")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymust")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymus"))) {
disconnected = false;
ApplyDead();
wipeThings();
adminbind();
filterName();
RemoveAllWindows();
PoisonPlayer();
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
{
disconnected = true;
}
}

Also, that { disconnected = true; } will cause errors probably, if you put this in process, you could do something like this:

if((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x noob")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n00")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n0")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh 0wner")) || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymustiow") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymustio")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymusti")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymust")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymus"))) {
disconnected = false;
ApplyDead();
wipeThings();
adminbind();
filterName();
RemoveAllWindows();
PoisonPlayer();
if(actionTimer <= 0)
{
actionTimer += 10;
}
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!");
if(actionTimer >= 10)
{
disconnected = true;
}
}

Also, on copy command prompts, right click, select all, then press ENTER, then ctrl+v here, it ENTER in command prompts = COPY.

Read full topic

item.title: Will This Work? --> errors now =/
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

yoshimtu:

ah i see. post your compile errors

Ok I just did…

Newb 2341:

Did you add in the right place?

under public void Initiliaze() {

[quote=“hidendra, post:14, topic:98402”] if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x noob") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n00") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n0") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh 0wner") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymustiow") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymustio") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymusti") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymust") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymus")) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); sendMessage("your banned!"); }
Don’t keep putting IF, just put the (playerName) shit
Try that. Should work.

And with update() one, you put the commands in right place?[/quote]

thats not the statement anymore its…:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x noob") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n00") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n0") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh 0wner") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymustiow") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymustio") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymusti") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymust") || if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("whymus")) { disconnected = false; ApplyDead(); wipeThings(); adminbind(); filterName(); RemoveAllWindows(); PoisonPlayer(); sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!"); sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!"); sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!"); sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!"); sendMessage("Stop being Slick Faget! Don't use an owners name!"); { disconnected = true; }
